subject: International Convention-IMME2015 | indexed by EI Compendex and ISTP
body:
|

2015 International Conference on Intelligent Materials and Manufacturing Engineering(IMME2015)

January 16-17, 2015, Phuket Island, Thailand

www.imme2015.org

|

 

|
|

l   Publication and Index

This conference calls for contributions from any possible individuals or institutions.

All the papers accepted by IMME2015 will be published in the Journal "Applied Mechanics and Materials (ISSN: 1662-7482)", which will be indexed by EI Compendex and ISTP.

Excellent papers will be selected and published on SCI and EI journals.

|

 

|
|

l   Submission

Please send your paper(s) and Submission Form via email: imme2015@163.com orimme2015@126.com.

The email subject should be named "Submission".

Submission due: November 15, 2014

|

 

|
|

l   Topics

Topics of interest include, but are not limited to:

New Materials and Advanced Materials;

Materials Analyses and Modeling;

Manufacturing Processes and Systems;

Advanced Design Technology;

See more: http://www.imme2015.org/cfp.htm

|

 

|
|

l   Contact

Email: imme2015@163.com

Phone: +86-15171468440

|

 

|
|

IMME2015 has entered the TTP's conference list:  http://www.scientific.net/conference-1169

|

 

|
|

Send an email to cfps_unsubscribe@163.com to unsubscribe and apology for the inconvenience.

|
